H0.text: Small intestine is the organ in the body where chemical digestion mainly takes place.

H1.text: Liver is the organ in which chemical digestion mainly takes place in the body.

H2.text: Kidneys are the organ in the body where chemical digestion mainly takes place.

H3.text: Large intestine is the organ in the body where chemical digestion mainly takes place.

A4.text: The small intestine is where most chemical digestion takes place.
